subject: Re: [junit] Looking for some "Best Practices"
msgSnippet: Quoth Bill de hÓra: [...] ... Is there a problem with having such cycles? -- Steven Taschuk           | The world will end if you get this wrong.
messageBody:
Quoth Bill de hÓra:
[...]
> One think I don't like about the way Junit does test suites, aside
> from the effort of remembering to add a test to a suite, is that it
> drives the dependencies downward. AllTests at the top of the tree
> has to know about all the tests or testsuites below it.
> [...] This seems to introduce cycles in Java packages [...]

Is there a problem with having such cycles?

--
Steven Taschuk | "The world will end if you get this wrong."
staschuk@... | (Brian Kernighan and Lorrinda Cherry,
| "Typesetting Mathematics -- User's Guide")
